mdRecord.dcterms:title: Trees of Mount Vernon, December 1931
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Photographer unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of original trees along the north serpetine path. Photograph is printed in reverse. There are inked numbers written on the photograph and identified as the following trees: 1) holly tree (#60); 2) ash tree (#58); 3) hemlock tree (#55); 4) young yellow poplar (#52); 5) linden tree (#54); and 6) yellow poplar (#57). Photograph is mounted on card for stability.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Trees
